short_summary: Bids for Leica Geosystems 3D laser scanners
description: Supply, delivery and offloading of Leica Geosystems 3D laser scanners. One (1) year NISO, with three (3) one-year option periods.
full_summary:
### Laser Scanner Packages: Closed Tender Announcement
#### Government Tender Announcement M5000-213802
---

**Issuing Authority**: Department of Public Works and Government Services, Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC/PSPC)

**Subject**: Request for Standing Offer (RfSO) - Laser Scanner Packages

**Notice Number**: WS3595816563-Doc3595861857

**Notice Type**: RfSO (Request for Standing Offer)

**Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)

**Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding

**Standards and Trade Agreements**: This procurement is subject to the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) and other applicable trade agreements.

**Procurement Objective**: The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) requires one (1) year National Individual Standing Offer(s) (NISO), with three (3) one-year option periods, for the supply, delivery and offloading of Leica Geosystems 3D laser scanners to various RCMP locations across Canada.

**Specifications**:
- The proposed solution must include products that are of the same description, brand name, model, and/or part number as detailed in the item description of the bid solicitation.
- Substitute products will not be considered.

**Closing Date and Time**: 14:00 EST on January 12, 2023. **Please note that all bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive**.

**Contacts**:
- Erin Kaiser (SPAC/PSPC), erin.kaiser@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Attachments**: None
- Tender Description and Bid Solicitation Package available on Ariba Discovery

**Notice URL**: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14706068?extsite=MTQ3MDYwNjhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14706068?extsite=MTQ3MDYwNjhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
